resources.string:
Effective Date: 14 January 2026

XOXO (“the App”, “we”, “our”, or “us”) values your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information in accordance with applicable data protection laws, including the Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA) of Thailand.

1. Information We Collect

We may collect the following types of personal information:
• Account information such as username, email address, and phone number
• Profile information such as photos, age, gender, interests, and personal descriptions
• Usage information such as matches, chats, likes, and interactions within the App
• Technical information such as IP address, device type, operating system, and log data

2. Purpose of Data Collection

We use your personal data to:
• Provide matchmaking and communication features
• Display user profiles and enable interactions
• Improve and optimize the App’s functionality and user experience
• Prevent fraud, misuse, and inappropriate behavior
• Maintain the security and integrity of the system

3. Disclosure of Personal Data

We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties. Your information may be disclosed only in the following cases:
• To service providers necessary for operating the App
• When required by law, regulation, or legal process

4. Data Storage and Security

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or misuse. Personal data will be retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Policy, unless otherwise required by law.

5. User Rights

You have the right to:
• Access and obtain a copy of your personal data
• Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
• Request deletion or anonymization of your data
• Withdraw consent for data processing at any time
• Delete or deactivate your account

6. Account Deletion

Upon account deletion, your personal data will be deleted or anonymized within a reasonable period, except where retention is required by law.

7. Minors

The App is intended for users aged 18 years or older. We do not knowingly collect personal data from individuals under 18. Accounts found to belong to minors will be removed immediately.

8. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be communicated through the App.

9. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
Email: hello.xoxo.com@gmail.com

Effective Date: 14 January 2026

These Terms of Service (“Terms”) govern your access to and use of the XOXO application. By using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

1. Eligibility

• You must be at least 18 years old to use the App
• You agree to provide accurate, current, and truthful information

2. Permitted Use

You may use the App to:
• Create and manage a personal profile
• Match and communicate with other users
• Access features provided by the App in accordance with these Terms

3. Prohibited Conduct

You agree not to:
• Impersonate another person or provide false information
• Harass, threaten, abuse, or exploit other users
• Engage in scams, fraud, solicitation, or commercial activities
• Upload or share illegal, explicit, or inappropriate content
• Use the App in any way that may harm other users or the system

4. User Responsibility

You acknowledge and agree that:
• We do not guarantee the accuracy or authenticity of other users’ information
• Any interaction or meeting outside the App is at your own risk
• You are solely responsible for your actions and decisions when using the App

5. Account Suspension or Termination

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time if you violate these Terms, without prior notice.

6. User Content

You retain ownership of the content you upload. However, by using the App, you grant us a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use such content solely for operating and improving the App.

7. Disclaimer of Liability

The App is provided on an “as is” basis. We are not responsible for any loss, damage, or harm resulting from your use of the App or interactions with other users.

8. Changes to the Terms

We may modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of the App after changes are made constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

9. Contact Information

For questions regarding these Terms, please contact us at:
Email: hello.xoxo.com@gmail.com
